segments.text: Hi . You said that you might need some help with preparing dinner . What would you like me to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for coming over to help . I really appreciate it . First , could you peel the vegetables ? I ’ Ve put them all in the skin and there ’ s a peeler .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I ’ ll peel the vegetables and you chop them . I ’ m terrible at chopping vegetables . I always seem to chop them into pieces that are either too big or too small . ... wow ! You can chop vegetable really quickly , just like professional chefs on TV !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After you ’ Ve chopped the vegetables , could you fry the meat in a little oil ? Just use a very small amount of oil . Fry the meat until it is cooked , then we ’ ll add some spices to flavor it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which spices are you going to add to the meat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These ones here . The one on the left is very spicy , so we must be careful about how much we add .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We don't want everyone to burn their mouths and have a drink gallons of water ! OK . I ’ m really to do the meat . Should I cook it over a low flame ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cook it over a high flame , so that it will be ready quickly . Keep stirring the meat around the frying pan . Don ’ t let the meat stick to the bottom of the pan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . What are you doing over there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m mixing the sauce . It ’ s my specialty . I make it according to my own secret recipe !
segments.speaker: S2
